meanings.sent1: The picnic by the riverbanks was peaceful and relaxing.
meanings.sent2: We walked along the riverbanks to enjoy the view of the water.
meanings.sent3: The ducks waddled along the riverbanks, looking for tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like a river along the peaceful riverbanks.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers bloomed along the vibrant riverbanks.

meanings.definition: The sloping sides of a river.
meanings.sent1: The children slid down the steep riverbanks with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen cast their lines from the edge of the riverbanks.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous dog tried to climb up the slippery riverbanks.
meanings.sent4: The shadows danced on the curved riverbanks as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The river rushed past the rocky riverbanks, carrying leaves downstream.
